rows.label: qst101413_msg001
rows.name:
If you use the Buno Fruit from Gula,
you can defeat it easily. (Temp)

rows.label: qst101413_msg0001
rows.name: Well, hello. Interested in plants?

rows.label: qst101413_msg0002
rows.name:
The crops are failing
everywhere... I'm researching
how to grow them efficiently...

rows.label: qst101413_msg0003
rows.name: He is... I see...

rows.label: qst101413_msg0004
rows.name:
When we were young, we often
teamed up for fieldwork...

rows.label: qst101413_msg0005
rows.name: The Rampaging Sauros...

rows.label: qst101413_msg0006
rows.name: I am a researcher of plants, but...

rows.label: qst101413_msg0007
rows.name:
some of them have special effects
only on specific creatures.

rows.label: qst101413_msg0008
rows.name:
A few years ago, I published my
research findings on the Rampaging
Sauros and the Buno Fruit.

rows.label: qst101413_msg0009
rows.name:
When a Rampaging Sauros
ingests a Buno Fruit,

rows.label: qst101413_msg0010
rows.name:
it enters a state of intoxication
and its activity level decreases.

rows.label: qst101413_msg0011
rows.name:
In other words... it gets
drunk, just like a person.

rows.label: qst101413_msg0012
rows.name:
If you strike it then, you
should be able to suppress it,
no matter how ferocious it is.

rows.label: qst101413_msg0013
rows.name:
Normally, the Rampaging
Sauros hides in its lair
and doesn't show itself.

rows.label: qst101413_msg0014
rows.name:
But there should be claw
marks nearby, which are a
sign of its territory.

rows.label: qst101413_msg0015
rows.name:
If you place the strongly scented Buno
Fruit in its territory to lure it out
and make it eat it, you've got it.

rows.label: qst101413_msg0016
rows.name:
The Buno Fruit is one of the
few plant fruits that can be
harvested in Superbia.

rows.label: qst101413_msg0017
rows.name:
You should be able to get it near
the Geothermal Turbine Tower.

rows.label: qst101413_msg0018
rows.name: You should go and look.

rows.label: qst101413_msg0019
rows.name:
If I had been with him, I
might have noticed that we
were approaching its lair...

rows.label: qst101413_msg0020
rows.name:
I pray that giving you this
knowledge will be a tribute to him.

rows.label: qst101413_msg0101
rows.name:
The Buno Fruit should be
harvestable near the
Geothermal Turbine Tower.

rows.label: qst101413_msg0102
rows.name:
Place it in its territory to
lure it out. Understood?
